title: Did 'surprised' husband kill wife, mistress & teen, then flee?
itunes:title: Did 'surprised' husband kill wife, mistress & teen, then flee?
description:
Michael Bullinger is missing from the Idaho farmhouse that his wife believed would be their retirement paradise. The wife's body was found in a shed, next to the corpse of her husband's mistress and her teen daughter, all killed by gunshots to the head. In this episode, Nancy Grace talks to a friend of the dead girlfriend along with investigator Sheryl McCollum.


Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
